meanings.definition: A mixture of proteins obtained by the hydrolysis of certain proteins.
meanings.sent1: The proteoses were used in the experiment to study their properties.

meanings.definition: Proteoses are intermediate products of protein hydrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how proteoses are formed during digestion.
meanings.sent2: The proteoses play a crucial role in the breakdown of proteins.
meanings.sent3: At the protein party, the proteoses were the cool kids hanging out in the middle.
